title: skript粒子怎么写
txt_content:
我想用skript写 像mm那样的粒子
不知道什么写法  wiki'那里也没有写
我这里有一句
drawWings style 12, particle1 "flame", speed 0, RGB 0, 0, 0, particle2 "redstone", speed2 0, RGB2 0, 0, 0, particle3 "redstone", speed3 0, RGB3 245, 122, 0, center player, id "T1.%player%", isSingle false, player, rainbowMode false, angle 110, height 0, space 0.2, visibleRange 30, tps 1, second 2
这是啥啊我**
个人已写了1年sk

replies.author: 极光creeper
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 极光creeper 于 2020-1-15 18:00 编辑 

不用看 肯定用附属skDragon了
自己去查skDragon的教程


给你个例子吧
吾辈的站外搬运贴 https://tieba.baidu.com/p/6148798518
原贴 这链接自己会爆炸，https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/og-particles-gui-│-wings-│-halos.64689/
自己浏览器复制全了去搜

然后网站我应该不用和你说了吧
这个是HUB https://skripthub.net/docs/
这个是UNITY https://docs.skunity.com/syntax/search/drawWing


拆几个例子给你好了

作者: pepo19

drawWings style 1, particle1 "redstone", speed 0, XYZ 0, 0, 0, particle2 "redstone", particle3 "redstone", center player, id "wings.%player%", rainbowMode true, flapSpeed 2, flapRange 30, angle 120, height 0, space 0.2, visibleRange 30, tps 0, second 3复制代码
drawWings style 1, particle1 "waterbubble", speed 0, XYZ 0, 0, 0, particle2 "waterbubble", particle3 "waterbubble", center player, id "wings.%player%", rainbowMode true, flapSpeed 2, flapRange 30, angle 120, height 0, space 0.2, visibleRange 30, tps 0, second 3复制代码
drawWings style 1, particle1 "waterwake", speed 0, XYZ 0, 0, 0, particle2 "waterwake", particle3 "waterwake", center player, id "wings.%player%", rainbowMode true, flapSpeed 2, flapRange 30, angle 120, height 0, space 0.2, visibleRange 30, tps 0, second 3复制代码
drawWings style 1, particle1 "mobspell", speed 0, XYZ 0, 0, 0, particle2 "mobspell", particle3 "mobspell", center player, id "wings.%player%", flapSpeed 2, flapRange 30, angle 120, height 0, space 0.2, visibleRange 30, tps 0, second 3复制代码
drawWings style 1, particle1 "mobspellambient", speed 0, XYZ 0, 0, 0, particle2 "mobspellambient", particle3 "mobspellambient", center player, id "wings.%player%", flapSpeed 2, flapRange 30, angle 120, height 0, space 0.2, visibleRange 30, tps 0, second 3复制代码
drawWings style 1, particle1 "waterdrip", speed 0, XYZ 0, 0, 0, particle2 "waterdrip", particle3 "waterdrip", center player, id "wings.%player%", flapSpeed 2, flapRange 30, angle 120, height 0, space 0.2, visibleRange 30, tps 0, second 3复制代码
drawWings style 1, particle1 "townaura", speed 0, XYZ 0, 0, 0, particle2 "townaura", particle3 "townaura", center player, id "wings.%player%", flapSpeed 2, flapRange 30, angle 120, height 0, space 0.2, visibleRange 30, tps 0, second 3复制代码
drawWings style 1, particle1 "portal", speed 0, XYZ 0, 0, 0, particle2 "portal", particle3 "portal", center player, id "wings.%player%", flapSpeed 2, flapRange 30, angle 120, height 0, space 0.2, visibleRange 30, tps 0, second 3复制代码
